forceLoadStatus.name: Force Load Status
forceLoadStatus.note: This setting force-loads the status of users from the WebSocket. Be aware that this can cause high performance usage because after a while a lot users are in the cache. I try to work on something that improves that, if you don't want it, simply disable.

dndColor.name: Do Not Disturb Color
dndColor.note: Color for "Do Not Disturb" status indicator.

showChatTyping.name: Typing
showChatTyping.note: Show typing state in the chat.

chatRadialStatus.name: Radial Status
chatRadialStatus.note: Shows the status as border instead of pointer.

showMemberlistTyping.note: Show typing state in the member list.

memberlistRadialStatus.note: Shows the status as border instead of pointer.
